name: serverdate
description: Make the server's clock available to the browser.

scripts.test:server: docker run --name=serverdate_server --net=ServerDate --volume=$PWD:/usr/src/app --workdir=/usr/src/app --rm node:4 npm run test:stage2
scripts.pretest: npm run test:network; npm run test:client
scripts.test:clean: docker rm --force serverdate_client; docker network rm ServerDate
